product_name: Osprey Airporter LZ Backpack Travel Cover - Medium
long_description: The Osprey Airporter LZ backpack travel cover hauls your medium-size backpack when you're flying across the country or around the world for far-flung hiking adventures. 2-way zippered opening with zipper path allows easy loading and unloading of your backpack. ID window pocket on front for easy identification. When not using, stash the Airporter LZ inside its own top pocket for easy storage. Lockable zippers; locks sold separately. The Osprey Airporter LZ backpack travel cover features webbing handles for easy transport and a reinforced bottom for durability.
short_description: The Osprey Airporter LZ backpack travel cover hauls your medium-size backpack when you're flying across the country or around the world for far-flung hiking adventures.
